body_html: It seems that you have a fully utilized GPU even before you run the script? I suspect it might be a NCCL problem. Can you try to kill all Python processes, make sure that you have 0% GPU utilization, and run the script again?
body_text: It seems that you have a fully utilized GPU even before you run the script? I suspect it might be a NCCL problem. Can you try to kill all Python processes, make sure that you have 0% GPU utilization, and run the script again?
body: It seems that you have a fully utilized GPU even before you run the script? I suspect it might be a NCCL problem. Can you try to kill all Python processes, make sure that you have 0% GPU utilization, and run the script again?
